评论详情: honestly love the size and functionality of the bag. The cross body sling is comfortable and easy to adjust. I get complimented on this bag at least once a week and am always having people ask me where I got it from. Only negative about the bag is that the frayed edges of the sling causes the thread to come off easily and I am constantly ripping off the strings. However, I think that the loose strings sometimes add character to the bag lol.
This was a Christmas gift.
The strap is falling apart, strings handing off.

评论概述: Great size but strap falling apart after use
评论详情: The bag itself was exactly what I wanted for travel, but the strap is not stitched on the edges and started to unravel almost immediately. It also slides out of where it attaches to the bag regularly.

Craftsmanship is the only problem. The zipper is misaligned by a few inches, making the closure more of a suggestion and threads keep unraveling out of it unprompted. If it were made better it would have been perfect.

评论概述: Nice bag but the shoulder strap frays too much
评论详情: I love the size of the bag and the material but they didn’t sew the shoulder strap correctly so that the ends don’t fray. I’m constantly having to pull off strings.
I liked it because it served the purpose that I needed. However the the bag was poorly made.

I absolutely love this bag, so much as I have the red one too.  It holds anything and more, great to take to a flea market, I carry this and everybody want to "here can you put this in your purse" type thing . It stays on my shoulder or cross body.  A definite must have!!!
The pockets are ripping off at the seams and the material is coming apart. Don’t waste your money
Great for a big bag to fit a lot of stuff. But the strap started coming apart string by string. I still like it though.

评论概述: Great! but the strap could use some work
评论详情: This is my favorite bag! The edges of the strap fray and there's nothing stopping it from sliding right out though, I wove it back in the buckle and that seemed to keep it in place. Other than the issues with the strap it's a wonderful bag. (I also had a big enamel pin on it to keep it from sliding out for a while)
I absolutely love this bag! It’s made really well and thick

For what you get it isn’t bad. I tie dyed mine and it looks super cute. I noticed it came unhooked or whatever so I tied mine so it wouldn’t and honestly I love it just sucks the strap decided to commit.

This bag is like a rag.  It’s not well made and it smelled really bad, I think it may be the dye or something, seemed washable- so gently washed it, bought came apart, still smelled. The idea is cute, the style is cute. The quality not so much.
Excellent

The hobo bag was just as described. I like the appearance the quality was pretty good. I just wished the material was not so heavy by the time you put a wallet, keys, or anything in it, just pulled your clothes down at the top of the shoulder and was not comfortable at all to carry. But overall it was a nice bag.
The purse is so cute and holds all my stuff. But the strap shreds as you use it

评论概述: Love it, love it, love it!!
评论详情: So far, I LOVE this bag. I got it to use for work, and have been greatly impressed. It fits everything I need (My MacBook, my lunch, even my tumbler!). The only thing that I had a slight problem with (and I mean slight) was that the strap would loosen while I walked. While I feel this was also my doing, with all the weight I put in it, it was a simple fix. All I did was pull the strap back through the top and it hasn't come loosened since. Highly recommend!! Especially for a college student like me.
This bag is awesome and I’ve got many compliments
